#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		int a[1001],x;
		for (int i = 0; i < 1001; ++i)
		{
			a[i]=0;
		}
		for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
		{
			cin>>x;
			a[x]++;			
		}
		for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
		{
			cin>>x;
			a[x]--;			
		}
		int big=0,count=0;
		for (int i = 0; i < 1001; ++i)
		{
			count+=a[i];
			if(count>big)
				big=count;
		}
		cout<<big<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
